alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis; Central St. Louis; Northern Aitkin; South Aitkin (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 30 at 4:50PM CST by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...AN AREA OF HEAVY SNOW SHOWERS WILL AFFECT EAST CENTRAL AITKIN... SOUTHWESTERN ST. LOUIS AND WESTERN CARLTON COUNTIES... At 450 PM CST, an area of heavy snow showers were along a line extending from 7 miles northeast of Toivola, to near Floodwood, to near Tamarack, and moving southeast at 5 mph. Visibilities of 1/2 mile or less and rapid snow accumulation on roads are expected with this area of heavy snow showers. This area of heavy snow showers will be near... Meadowlands and Tamarack around 455 PM CST. Fond Du Lac Band Brookston Area around 505 PM CST. Cromwell around 525 PM CST. Other locations impacted by this area of heavy snow showers include Gowan, Sheshebee, Kelsey, Wright, Lawler, Burnett, Payne, Elmer, Prosit, and Automba. Be prepared for changing visibility and road conditions. Reduce your speed and allow more space between you and the vehicle in front of you.

area.areaDesc: Carlton, South St. Louis; Central St. Louis; Northern Aitkin; South Aitkin
